name: BOXING (itch) (OldbearLive, Tejaswini, LEAsmodeus, blacksad123, DapperPenguin)
description:
GAME OVERVIEW

A remake of the classic boxing game on the Atari, this game aims to emulate the old gold that was Atari boxing. The game has been remade from the ground up, with full rotational movement, and a new blocking mechanic.

This two-player game will test your skill against your friends, to see who can come out on top as the champion.

CONTROLS Player 1:
  • WASD  (movement)
  • H or Space  (Tap to punch, hold to block)
Player 2:
  • ARROW KEYS  (movement)
  • RIGHT SHIFT or X  (Tap to punch, hold to block)
